attributes.action: Honour the promise made by his Government to allow the people of the U.K. a Referendum on accepting the E.U. Constitution, recently renamed as the E.U. Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is treasonous for the Prime Minister to accept the E.U.Treaty. To say that it is not a Consitution is unrealistic as even of its main architects : Valery Giscard d'Estang admits it to be effectively the same as the Constitution already rejected, and other E.U. Leaders have also admitted it to be so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
